body:
well 1greathero (my brother) can't vote. It says "Sorry you have to wait 24hs" for days it said that.
any of you know what happen?
body_tagged:
well 1greathero (my brother) can't vote. It says "Sorry you have to wait 24hs" for days it said that.
any of you know what happen?
title: Help?

replies.body: Are you both using the same computer?
replies.body_tagged: Are you both using the same computer?

replies.body: does anyone else vote on avicus and uses your brother's computer?
replies.body_tagged: does anyone else vote on avicus and uses your brother's computer?

replies.body: When was the last time he voted? It has to be exactly 24 hours or more between each voting session.
replies.body_tagged: When was the last time he voted? It has to be exactly 24 hours or more between each voting session.

replies.body: If you have the same IP address, you can only vote once. I have two computers and can only vote once per day on only one. The other has the same ip so every time I switch over and try it tells me I have voted. This is the same with mobile devices.
replies.body_tagged: If you have the same IP address, you can only vote once. I have two computers and can only vote once per day on only one. The other has the same ip so every time I switch over and try it tells me I have voted. This is the same with mobile devices.

replies.body:
hmmm..
1.empty his cache+history. then restart browser and try again
2.Restart your router and try again
Any of these work?

replies.body: I voted a couple of minutes ago, then I started Minecraft and logged in. I didn't get the 30 XP.

replies.body: takes more than a minute usually, takes about the time for one to log on mc, play a nebula match, and get off.

replies.body:
Did you get the xp from yesterday?
If yes:try voting again, if it denies you again, try empting your cache, restarting your browser and trying again, if it still doesn't.. I guess you'll still have to wait D:
If no: look for two emeralds in your hub inventory
